captions.text:
will speak on behalf
of Delta House.
[Cheering, Whistling]
<i>[Pounding Gavel]</i>
[Clears Throat]

I don't think you can fully
judge a fraternity...

without looking at the positive
qualities of the people in it.

<i>The Delta house</i>
<i>has a long tradition...</i>

<i>of existence to its members</i>
<i>and to the community at large.</i>

I think we've heard enough,
Mr. Chairman.

- I was told I'd have a chance to...
- That's enough!

The court will now render
a decision.

You said I could speak...
He said that's it!

- Are you deaf?
- Let's finish this damn thing.

Blow job!
[Clears Throat, Coughs]

[All Coughing, Muttering]
Blow job! Blow job!

- I don't think it's fair!
- I'll tell you what's fair!

Eat me!
[Coughing]

- [Pounds Gavel]
<i>- [Coughing, Muttering]</i>

Will you tell those assholes
to shut up?
Hey, shut up, you assholes!

<i>Mr. President, do we have to</i>
<i>listen to any more of this?</i>

Point of parliamentary procedure.
Don't screw around.

Take it easy.
I'm in pre-law, man.

I thought you were premed.
What's the difference?

Ladies and gentlemen,
I'll be brief.

- What do you think he's up to?
<i>- The issue here...</i>

is not whether
we broke a few rules...

or took a few liberties
with our female party guests.
We did.

<i>But you can't hold</i>
<i>a whole fraternity responsible...</i>

<i>for the behavior of a few</i>
<i>sick, perverted individuals.</i>
<i>For if you do...</i>

then shouldn't we blame
the whole fraternity system?

And if the whole fraternity
system is guilty...
then isn't this an indictment...

of our educational
institutions in general?
[Applause]
I put it to you, Gregg.

<i>Isn't this an indictment</i>
<i>of our entire American society?</i>
[Cheering]

Well, you can do
what you want to us...

but we're not going to sit here
and listen to you...

bad-mouth
the United States of America.

- Gentlemen!
- [Cheering]

[Gregg Pounding Gavel]
Order!

## [Humming
"The Star-Spangled Banner"]

<i>[Dean Wormer] You're not walking out</i>
<i>on this one, mister.</i>
You're finished.
No more Delta!
You bought it this time, buster.
<i>I'm calling your national office.</i>
I'm going to revoke your charter!

<i>And if you wise guys</i>
<i>try one more thing...</i>

one more... I'm going
to kick you out of this college.
No more fun of any kind!

comments.text:
You don't even know enough to be embarrassed by your ignorance. The labor 
participation rate is not unemployment; it's labor participation. It may 
even drop lower as boomers continue to retire. Maybe what you want to say 
is that the U6 (the rate of people seeking but not finding work) is still 
too high--though that's under 12% now, having fallen from the George Bush 
level of %20.
comments.author: Robert Slack

comments.text:
Amazing how many stupid people there are in the world today.  (shakes my 
head)  I just don't know.  Well have fun with your 38% unemployment under 
comrade Obama.  And when I say 38%, I mean the actual unemployment rate 
called the Workforce participation Rate.  You know, the one that accounts 
for everyone in the us that is of working age/discounts retirement that can 
get a job (excludes those that can't for age, disabilities, etc.  We have 
less people working right now than we did when STAR WARS came out in 1977, 
but we have 100 million people more.  This is the first time that Arab 
nations sided with Israel ever.  Our allies don't trust us and he is 
appeasing our enemies.  Oh yeah he is a real winner.  Well he is your 
communist hero and is leading you down a path of stupidity.  but that is 
what you bought so I guess argue it to the end.  Later losers.

comments.author: Jelperman

comments.text:
Yeah.  You brats don't know how it was like cause you weren't there..  
Unlike what you are being told now a days, everyone had a job.  Everyone 
looked to bettering themselves and making a success.  There was not rampant 
racism as they would have you believe.  In fact no one really cared what 
color you were.  If it was so racist, then how did many African American 
performers like Eddie Murphey become #1 box office draws and the Cosby Show 
be the #1 show.  People were happy and we all believed in "United we stand 
and divided we fall"  More people from different races, social statuses and 
walks of life became millionaires.  It was the largest expansion of our 
economy ever once we got that lame dick Jimmy Carter out of the White House 
cause he was a loser failure.  Not how it is now with you guys being told 
lies about how it was back then and that we were all racists who hated each 
other.  No one cared what race or color you were.  Yes, it was glorious.  I 
lived it.  And you know what else.  We hated communism back then.  Not how 
you guys are now who embrace it's re-branded name "Progressives".  Not many 
people were on psychiatric drugs cause not many people were crazy.  You 
actually learned real history in school and not this phony history they are 
passing along.  Our students were not so stupid that we ranked the bottom 
of the list like Millennials and kids of today are in world rankings.  It 
was fucking awesome to have lived through it.  It was the most fun period 
to live in next to the 50's from people who lived in the 50's.  I was a 
teenager/adult then.  You guys missed out on the most fun/best time ever.
 
Unlike how you depressing assholes now are having the old "divide and 
Conquer" applied to them.  Oldest trick in the book.  Everyone is made to 
have everyone now.  Women say all men are rapists (Not even true but you 
guys are believing that lie.  Race relations are the worst ever now.  A 
town was completely burnt down on a made up lie of Hands up don't shoot.  
Eric Holder's DOJ even confirmed that it was all bullshit.  I guarantee you 
future generations are going to look on this time and this PC crap and call 
you guys the dumbest generation ever.  What am I talking about.  They are 
already doing it now.  Bid study 2 weeks ago shows that Millenials are at 
the bottom of the list of nations when it comes to reading skills, working 
skills and basic problem solving.  Translations =  you guys collectively 
are dumb asses.  Congratulations on being the generation to hit rock 
bottom.  We couldn't even do that in the 80's if we tried.  And thank god 
MSNBC is doing so poorly ratings wise cause no one is believing that 
craptacular channel anymore it is about to change it's entire format and 
most everyone there is going to be fired.  You guys had your PC/progressive 
communist bullshit shot.  And like every time it was tried before, it 
failed miserably cause it is built on a lie.  You guys are on more 
psychiatric drugs and committing suicide more than every in history of our 
country.  Your the lowest graduation and test scores ever.  Right now there 
are less people working then when Star Wars came out and we had 100 million 
less people (check it out.  It's called the Labor Participation Rate).  the 
actual unemployment rate is at 38%.  What does your generation have going 
for you.  Nothing.  Belief in a bullshit system that fails every time it is 
done.
